property.name: opentsdb.install_dir
property.description: Directory under which OpenTSDP will be installed (e.g. /root/opentsdb). Will be created if not already exists.

property.name: opentsdb.download_url
property.description: Online location to download OpenTSDB .tar.gz package from

property.name: opentsdb.create_schema
property.description: Whether OpenTSDB schema should be created. Hbase must be started if this is selected

property.name: opentsdb.start_cmd
property.description: Command to launch demo daemon that Ambari will monitor. Port, zk base dir, zk quorum, cache dir can be customized
